text: A crusade has been called with the intention of conquering the city of Alexandria. As the holder of this city you must ensure this does not happen. The crusaders will be stopped at all costs.

A crusade has been called with the intention of conquering the city of Constantinople. As the holder of this city you must ensure this does not happen. The crusaders will be stopped at all costs.

Since the loss of Jerusalem to Saladin, the infidels have plotted its reconquest. Although a major crusade in 1187 ended in a stalemate, and the following crusade in 1204 ended in disaster for the Romans, the infidels have not abandoned their goal. Now, they aim to invade our homeland of Egypt as a stepping stone into the levant. The crusaders will be stopped at all costs.
A crusade has been called with the intention of conquering the city of Alexandria. Having joined this crusade, you must now act to secure the city from the infidels.
A crusade has been called with the intention of conquering the city of Cairo. Having joined this crusade, you must now act to secure the city from the infidels.
A crusade has been called with the intention of conquering the city of Tunis. Having joined this crusade, you must now act to secure the city from the infidels.
A crusade has been called with the intention of conquering the city of Toulouse. Having joined this crusade, you must now act to secure the city from the infidels.
A crusade has been called with the intention of conquering the city of Cordoba. Having joined this crusade, you must now act to secure the city from the infidels.
A crusade has been called with the intention of conquering the city of London. Having joined this crusade, you must now act to secure the city from the infidels.

The Fifth Crusade has begun with the intention of re-taking the Holy Land for Christendom, beginning with the conquest of Egypt. The main target of this crusade is the Egyptian city of Cairo. Once this city is taken, all that stand between us and the Holy Land will crumble!
A crusade has been called with the intention of conquering the city of Toledo. Having joined this crusade, you must now act to secure the city from the infidels.
A crusade has been called with the intention of conquering the city of Frankfurt. Having joined this crusade, you must now act to secure the city from the infidels.
A crusade has been called with the intention of conquering the city of Rome. Having joined this crusade, you must now act to secure the city from the infidels.
You have requested from His Holiness that all lands seized from the heretics remain in your domain in exchange for you taking back Jerusalem for the Kingdom of Jerusalem.
A crusade has been called with the intention of conquering the city of Paris. Having joined this crusade, you must now act to secure the city from the infidels.
A crusade has been called with the intention of conquering the city of Thessalonica. Having joined this crusade, you must now act to secure the city from the infidels.
A crusade has been called with the intention of conquering the city of Jerusalem. Having joined this crusade, you must now act to secure the city from the infidels.
A crusade has been called with the intention of conquering the city of Antioch. Having joined this crusade, you must now act to secure the city from the infidels.
A crusade has been called with the intention of conquering the city of Barcelona. Having joined this crusade, you must now act to secure the city from the infidels.
A crusade has been called with the intention of conquering the city of Constantinople. Having joined this crusade, you must now act to secure the city from the infidels.
Long ago, our ancestral lands were invaded and conquered by foreign invaders. Now, with a refuge in Cilicia, we may be poised to soon retake our homeland and establish a new Kingdom of Armenia.
The loss of Contantinople to the Latins has left the Roman empire scattered and weakened. This situation cannot continue for any longer - Constantinople belongs to the Romans!
The great sea of grass we have roamed on is populated by countless tribes. Their subjugation and support in future conquests is tantamount to the longevity of our dynasty.
The lands ahead of us belong to an old civilization. To take over their lands and prosper, it will be necessary to incorporate their great wisdom and administration.

The lands of the great Piast kings of old have fractured and the dukes jealously fight over it. As their noble heirs, it is our duty to bring back the great kingdom of Poland - the ruler of Krakow's supremacy must be restored!

The kingdom of the Visigoths has disappeared and we, their successors, look to Hispania as our own. Let us take back from the Moors what is ours, and unite the crowns to form a kingdom of prosperity and faith.

A great shame has befallen the house of Anjou, as the former continental bastion of the Norman Kings of England, Normandy, has fallen to French hands during the tenure of King John. If the Angevin are to be taken seriously both on the continent and in Britannia, Normandy must be retaken!

Whispers have alerted the King that nobles are conspiring, thinking him weak. The King of England must prove his worth and return prestige to the English crown. France has inflicted great defeats on the Angevin dynasty in recent years, returning the favour would quell these rebels, if only momentarily.
The English have attacked, but if we can hold them off then mass unrest will ensue in English lands, forcing an armistice.

A pretender to the imperial throne has arisen, intending to press a claim granted to him by the Pope. This threat can be neutralized directly, but if he is unable to consolidate his power then perhaps he shall lose support among the nobles of the Empire.

You have decided to press your claim to the imperial throne, and to do so you must occupy the imperial seat of power: Frankfurt. Alternatively, you could dispose of the rival emperor in battle or through less honorable means.

Five centuries ago the Moors invaded Hispania, their onslaught only halted in the fields of Aquitaine. Although stopped from invading France, most of Spain was in Moorish hands. The tables have since turned, as Christian realms now rule over half of the Iberian peninsula and the Moors are weaker than ever. Now is the time for the killing blow.

His Holiness demands that you stop shedding the blood of your fellow Christians. Cease hostilities against this faction immediately and make peace with them, or else the pope will be heavily displeased.
